sentences.english: I read before going to bed at night

sentences.speaker: B

sentences.pinyin: nǐ dú guò hóng lóu mèng ma?
sentences.english: Have you read 'Dream of the Red Chamber'?

sentences.english: Yes, it's a masterpiece of Chinese classical literature
sentences.speaker: B

sentences.pinyin: nǐ jué de nǎ gè jué sè zuì yǒu qù?
sentences.english: Which character do you find most interesting?

sentences.pinyin: wǒ xǐ huān lín dài yù, tā hěn cōng míng

sentences.pinyin: cáo xuě qín de xiě zuò jì qiǎo hěn jīng zhàn
sentences.english: Cao Xueqin's writing technique is very exquisite
sentences.speaker: A

sentences.pinyin: shì de, zhè bù xiǎo shuō fǎn yìng le dāng shí de shè huì
sentences.english: Yes, this novel reflects the society of that time

topic: Asking How to Write and Spell

sentences.pinyin: nǐ néng xiě xià lái ma?

sentences.speaker: B

sentences.speaker: B

sentences.pinyin: duì, yī bēi shuǐ, yī bēi chá
sentences.english: Yes, one cup of water, one cup of tea

sentences.pinyin: zhè ge zì shì jǐ shēng?
sentences.speaker: A

sentences.pinyin: shì dì sān shēng
sentences.speaker: B

sentences.pinyin: wǒ de fā yīn duì ma?
sentences.speaker: A

sentences.chinese: 基本对，但是声调要高一点
sentences.pinyin: jī běn duì, dàn shì shēng diào yào gāo yī diǎn
sentences.english: Basically correct, but the tone should be higher
sentences.speaker: B

sentences.pinyin: nǐ néng zài shuō yī biàn ma?
sentences.speaker: A

sentences.pinyin: hǎo de, qǐng tīng: māma
sentences.speaker: B

sentences.chinese: 为什么这个字的声调变了？
sentences.pinyin: wèi shén me zhè ge zì de shēng diào biàn le?
sentences.english: Why did the tone of this character change?
sentences.speaker: A

sentences.pinyin: yīn wèi yǒu biàn diào guī zé
sentences.english: Because there are tone sandhi rules
sentences.speaker: B

sentences.chinese: 两个第三声在一起怎么读？
sentences.pinyin: liǎng ge dì sān shēng zài yī qǐ zěn me dú?
sentences.english: How do you read two third tones together?
sentences.speaker: A

sentences.pinyin: dì yī ge yào dú chéng dì èr shēng
sentences.english: The first one should be read as second tone
sentences.speaker: B

sentences.pinyin: bù de shēng diào shén me shí hou biàn?
sentences.english: When does the tone of 'bu' change?
sentences.speaker: A

sentences.pinyin: zài dì sì shēng qián dú dì èr shēng
sentences.english: It's read as second tone before fourth tone
sentences.speaker: B

sentences.pinyin: zhè ge zì shì shén me yì si?
sentences.speaker: A

sentences.pinyin: tā de yì si shì xuéxí
sentences.speaker: B

sentences.pinyin: zhè liǎng ge zì yǒu shén me qū bié?
sentences.english: What's the difference between these two characters?
sentences.speaker: A

sentences.pinyin: kàn shì kàn jiàn, jiàn shì jiàn miàn
sentences.english: 'Kan' means to see, 'jian' means to meet
sentences.speaker: B

sentences.pinyin: néng jǔ gè lì zi ma?
sentences.speaker: A

sentences.pinyin: bǐ rú: wǒ kàn shū, míng tiān jiàn
sentences.english: For example: I read books, see you tomorrow
sentences.speaker: B

sentences.pinyin: zhè ge zì de bù shǒu shì shén me?
sentences.english: What is the radical of this character?
sentences.speaker: A

sentences.pinyin: bù shǒu shì sān diǎn shuǐ
sentences.english: The radical is the three-drop water
sentences.speaker: B

sentences.pinyin: sān diǎn shuǐ shì shén me yì si?
sentences.speaker: A

sentences.pinyin: biǎo shì gēn shuǐ yǒu guān de yì si
sentences.english: It indicates meanings related to water
sentences.speaker: B

sentences.pinyin: bǐ rú nǎ xiē zì?
sentences.speaker: A

sentences.pinyin: bǐ rú hé, hú, hǎi
sentences.speaker: B
